snippet: In Thursday's New York Times, Steve Lohr reports on Yahoo's pick for its next chief executive -- Scott Thompson, the president of PayPal, the online payment service owned by eBay.
abstract: In Thursday's New York Times, Steve Lohr reports on Yahoo's pick for its next chief executive -- Scott Thompson, the president of PayPal, the online payment service owned by eBay.
